title: Yukon - Charley Rivers National Preserve: Geologic Activity
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Environmental Factors     Geologic Activity                 Geologic Activity        NPS Photo by Ed Christensen       With millions of layers of geology exposed above the surface and two fault lines intersecting in the preserve, Yukon-Charley Rivers is rich with geologic activity. Learn more through the links below.           Windfall Mountain Fire A puzzling geologic event that began as an explosion in the fall of 2012.           Geologic Formations 600 million years of geologic history. Dig in.
